channel.title: Seriously? I can't believe it! Wildy is Back!
channel.description:
Not one person has posted about the wilderness finally coming back!! I swear I have waited for this day, well since they have taken it away from us. There were many doubts as to if this could be done due to all the PVP updates, and if Jagex was just trying to get a vote count.
Let's make this a OFFICIAL Moment of Silence, for the greatest thing to ever come to RuneScape!
Thanks for you voting guys!
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/the-wilderness-and-free-trade-will-return

item.title: Seriously? I can't believe it! Wildy is Back!

But yeah it’s pretty awesome.

item.title: Seriously? I can't believe it! Wildy is Back!
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

Not one person has posted about the wilderness finally coming back!! I swear I have waited for this day, well since they have taken it away from us. There were many doubts as to if this could be done due to all the PVP updates, and if Jagex was just trying to get a vote count.

Let’s make this a OFFICIAL Moment of Silence, for the greatest thing to ever come to RuneScape!

Thanks for you voting guys!

RuneScape

The Wilderness and Free Trade Will Return!

Over 91% of you voted in favour of reintroducing the Wilderness and free trade in the first RuneScape Referendum. We have heard your call and will be restoring these much loved features to RuneScape on Tuesday 1st February.

Read full topic
item.source: Seriously? I can't believe it! Wildy is Back!
